text_block_list.text: One day, after training was over. I saw Fuji Kiseki with some underclassmen.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Goodness, you're awfully naughty. You called me out here, in the middle of nowhere――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: What's the matter, Pony-chan?

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: U, um, Fuji-senpai ……

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I decided, today. I'm going to tell Senpai how I feel about her…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …That's quite alright. I'll accept it to the best of my ability.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Fuji-senpai… I really like you, Senpai!

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: As a first grade junior, I've always followed your back, Senpai. Someday, I'll catch up with that back… and then…

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: We'll stand side by side and… together… together we'll run… I, I thought.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: You――

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: That's why… I said this it was too much… And that I was so frustrated…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ――Come, lift your chin up.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I gathered from the President that you're leaving the Academy today. …She said you have a leg injury.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Uuugh…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: You were one of the most talented of the younger class. I knew that one day, you would be a formidable rival.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Above all, you were practicing harder than anyone else, weren't you? That's why I'm frustrated, too.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I've been watching you for all this time, too.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Fuji-senpai…!

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I wanted to run more… I wanted to keep running, get lots of wins, and one day…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: One day…

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …Can I entrust my dream to you, Senpai? As an Uma Musume, can I entrust my dream to…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I've most certainly received your feelings. Let's run, together. No matter how far.
A faint cry echoed in the evening glow of sunset. In the end, the junior left with a smile on her face.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: It looks as if you've seen my secret. I know you're in there, aren't you? Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …On occasion, there are girls that leave the academy like that. I feel tormented by a feeling of utter helplessness.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: How can I entertain a girl whose dreams have been dashed? I made her smile so sadly.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Entrust me with your dream "as an Uma Musume"――so she said.
――Speaking of which, Fuji Kiseki once told me that she gave up her dream of becoming an actor and chose racing…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: My dream? That, of course, is to "Make "Miracles" happen, and to entertain all."――
But… as soon as she said that, Fuji Kiseki fell silent. A sort of thoughtful expression appeared on her face.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Whoops, that's no good, no good at all. It's at times like this that "Fuji Kiseki" must laugh!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Please, keep what you saw today a secret. Look, it's just a promise between you and me――
Fuji Kiseki smiled as best she could.
